list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a liquid preparation containing detergent or soap for washing the hair.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he smelt clean, of soap and shampoo
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta smelt sạch, xà phòng và dầu gội

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: wash or clean (something, especially the hair) with shampoo.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Dolly was sitting in the bath shampooing her hair
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dolly đang ngồi trong bồn tắm gội đầu
